question: Okay so I was 10 days late on my PEROID on the 11th day I woke up spotting. It was brownish red ( like your last day period) then later that day it turned bright red to pinkish red. The flow started to get lighter to the point where I only see blood when I wipe or if it's with my pee. It's now day 2 and the same thing could I be pregnant
